meanings.definition: Having the shape of a rhombohedron.
meanings.sent1: The crystal had a rhombohedral shape.
meanings.sent2: The rhombohedral pattern was clearly visible under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The rhombohedral cake looked too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as perfectly rhombohedral as a cut diamond.
meanings.sent5: The rhombohedral clouds in the sky resembled giant cotton balls.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a crystal system characterized by three equal axes at oblique angles.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the rhombohedral crystal structure.
meanings.sent2: The mineral exhibited rhombohedral properties under UV light.
meanings.sent3: The rhombohedral gemstone sparkled like a disco ball.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts formed a rhombohedral lattice of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The rhombohedral arrangement of trees in the forest was mesmerizing.
